hard_constraints.description: It is required that the conjunction of the 'BasicData' plan selection and the 'ModelY' phone selection evaluates to false; thus, their simultaneous assignment is prohibited.
For any model selection where the element is 'ModelX', the existence of a selected accessory $A$ such that $A$ is not 'CaseA' is strictly disallowed.
The set of valid configurations must exclude the intersection of the 'PremiumData' plan selection and the 'CaseA' accessory selection.
